name: Dots and Boxes (alberto_mc)
description:
The aim of the game is to complete more squares than your oponent. In each turn, players can put only one line, except when the player complete a square. In that case, the player can still add one more line.

Pendings tasks to do:

  • [Bug] Under touchs devices or if devices are too slow, sometimes the added line is bigger simulating the preview, rather than thin simulating the fixed state.
  • [Feature] The last added line will be shown in red.
